DOC.brief_summary: This research do study whether use Internet-based program , call Therapeutic Education System ( TES ) , would helpful treatment substance use psychiatric problem .
DOC.detailed_description: TES show helpful substance abuse treatment certain group people , mainly outpatient set use interactive module education . This study expose participant program hospitalize inpatient unit , give access discharge hospital . Those participant still receive treatment usual , control group .
DOC.criteria: diagnosis drug alcohol problem , plus another psychiatric problem , depression anxiety drug alcohol use last 30 day proficiency English able consent study willing engage outpatient treatment willing allow study team contact outpatient provider psychotic symptom , hear voice involuntary admission
